about_the_game:
Embark on a sonic journey through the vibrant world of Wéko The Mask Gatherer with its enchanting original soundtrack! This collection captures the essence of Wéko’s magical landscapes, from serene village melodies to the intense rhythms of epic boss battles. Each track is crafted to immerse you deeper into the adventure, blending nostalgic 3D platformer vibes with a modern twist.

Music composed and produced by Quentin Charbit, this soundtrack is designed to evoke the same emotions and excitement you experience in the game. Whether you’re revisiting your favorite moments or simply looking for a captivating listening experience, the Wéko The Mask Gatherer soundtrack is sure to delight.

Download contains all the tracks in .mp3 and high-quality .wav.

short_description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Wéko The Mask Gatherer with the enchanting original soundtrack! Featuring 39 unique tracks, this collection spans 1 hour and 45 minutes of atmospheric melodies, epic themes, and memorable moments that bring the adventure to life.
